description: Once considered one of the most intelligent and beautiful members of Vulcan society, much of that has been washed away by the Borg's assimilation process, leaving T'Pring a husk of her former self. Now deployed as a ruthless and efficient drone, Three of Ten is used to help expand the Borg's range of incluence and turmoil. Whatever existed of this matriarch to a happy family has become another solider in the Borg's ongoing mission to control the galaxy.

captain_maneuver.name: Efficient Gas Acquisition
captain_maneuver.bonus: Three of Ten increases Gas mining speed by {value}

officer_ability.name: Resource Protection Protocols
officer_ability.bonus: Three of Ten increases Protected Cargo by {value}
